channel.title: Oluwole Fasakin - Application Architect & Data Engineering Lead
channel.description: Updates, projects, and insights from Oluwole Fasakin - Elite Application Architect & Data Engineering Lead with 9+ years experience delivering data-driven products and scalable engineering systems.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2025-2026 Oluwole Fasakin. All rights reserved.

item.title: Portfolio Update: New Brands & Client Work Added
item.dc:creator: Oluwole Fasakin
item.description: Excited to announce major updates to my portfolio showcasing work with IBM, Smooth Apply AI, LSTG, PHC CivcX, T.Valton, and EPC. Also featuring new client work for La Necar Logistics LLC including two web solutions and a highly effective lead magnet system.
item.content:encoded:
I'm thrilled to share major updates to my professional portfolio:

Brands I've Scaled

  • Smooth Apply AI - AI-powered job application platform
  • LSTG - Digital transformation initiative
  • IBM - Enterprise technology consulting
  • PHC CivcX - Civic technology solutions
  • T.Valton - Brand growth strategy
  • EPC - Engineering and project consulting

Client Work

Delivered comprehensive solutions for La Necar Logistics LLC including custom logistics management applications and a high-converting lead magnet system.

item.title: WitsLens: EdTech Platform - Digital Growth Strategy
item.dc:creator: Oluwole Fasakin
item.description: Led the digital growth and operational strategy for WitsLens, an innovative e-learning platform. Focused on enhancing scalability, member experience, and analytics visibility.
item.content:encoded:
WitsLens is an innovative EdTech platform designed to help learners explore knowledge through a clear lens.

As the digital strategy lead, I focused on:

  • Platform scalability and performance optimization
  • User experience enhancement
  • Analytics visibility and data-driven decision making
  • Member engagement and retention strategies

item.title: TechCurious: Innovation Community Launch
item.dc:creator: Oluwole Fasakin
item.description: Directed end-to-end digital strategy for TechCurious, an innovation community managing budgets and leading cross-functional teams to boost brand engagement and educational outcomes.
item.content:encoded:
TechCurious answers your spoken and unspoken technology curiosity.

Key achievements:

  • End-to-end digital strategy development
  • Cross-functional team leadership
  • Brand engagement optimization
  • Educational content delivery

item.title: Research Publication: COVID-19 and Cholera Co-infection
item.dc:creator: Oluwole Fasakin
item.description: Published research on COVID-19 and cholera co-infection and comorbidity in Africa and Asia: a systematic review and meta-analysis. Journal of Global Health Economics and Policy, 2024.

item.title: Research Publication: Rabies Prevention in Nigeria
item.dc:creator: Oluwole Fasakin
item.description: Contributed to research on holistic application of the One Health approach in the prevention and control of rabies in Nigeria. One Health Outlook, 2024.
